title: Premium Hospital Website — Aspirational Messaging & UI Polish

requirements.text: Replace all inflated or fabricated statistics (e.g., 'Trusted by 10,000+ patients', specific patient count claims) with honest, aspirational, mission-driven copy throughout the homepage, hero section, stats bar, and footer. Use forward-looking language such as 'Our mission is to be trusted by every patient, everywhere', 'Committed to delivering pure and proper healthcare to the world', 'Aspiring to set the global standard in patient care', and 'Built on the promise of world-class health facilities for all'. Remove any numeric claim that cannot be verified; replace with vision statements.

quotes: we are not here to make false promises so please don't write trusted by 10000 + patients write the realistic type of thing
will be trusted by the whole world aspirational you get it

acceptanceCriteria: No fabricated numeric statistics (patient counts, satisfaction percentages, etc.) appear anywhere on the site
Hero and stats sections contain aspirational, forward-looking mission statements instead
All copy reads as authentic and honest without inflated claims
Aspirational language is consistent in tone across homepage, hero, stats bar, departments section, and footer

requirements.text: Perform a comprehensive UI polish pass across all pages and components (HomePage, Header, Footer, hero section, stats bar, departments section, doctor showcase, LandingPage, RoleSelector). Improvements must include: (1) tighter, more intentional spacing and padding with consistent vertical rhythm; (2) refined typography — stronger visual hierarchy with clear heading scales, improved line-height and letter-spacing for readability; (3) elevated visual hierarchy so the most important content commands attention immediately; (4) premium card and section styling with subtle depth (shadows, borders, glassmorphism where appropriate); (5) smooth, tasteful animations and micro-interactions on scroll and hover; (6) cohesive color usage leveraging the existing teal/emerald/cyan palette defined in tailwind.config.js with proper contrast ratios; (7) a fully polished mobile layout with responsive breakpoints.

tightening spacing, refining typography, improving visual hierarchy, and making sure the overall feel is truly premium and professional

acceptanceCriteria: Spacing and padding are consistent and intentional across all sections
Typography hierarchy is clear: H1 > H2 > H3 > body with appropriate scale and weight
Cards, sections, and interactive elements have premium styling with depth and polish
Hover and scroll animations are smooth and purposeful without being distracting
Color palette is cohesive using the teal/emerald/cyan theme throughout
Layout is fully responsive and looks premium on mobile, tablet, and desktop

requirements.text: Redesign the hero section of the HomePage to be visually striking and aspirational. It should feature a bold, full-width layout with a strong headline communicating the hospital's world-class mission, a compelling subheadline with honest mission-driven copy, a prominent call-to-action button, and a high-quality visual element (gradient background, abstract medical imagery, or animated visual). The hero must immediately communicate trust, professionalism, and global ambition.

quotes: giving pure and proper health facilities

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section spans full viewport width with a premium visual design
Headline clearly communicates the hospital's aspirational, world-class mission
No false statistics or unverified claims appear in the hero
Call-to-action button is prominent and visually appealing
Hero looks outstanding on all screen sizes

requirements.text: Enhance the Footer component with refined layout, consistent branding, and honest mission-driven messaging. Replace any boilerplate or inflated claims with the hospital's core values: pure healthcare, proper facilities, and global aspiration. Include a brief mission statement tagline in the footer. Ensure the footer has premium spacing, proper visual separation, and is fully responsive.

quotes: giving pure and proper health facilities
will be trusted by the whole world aspirational

acceptanceCriteria: Footer contains a concise, honest mission statement or tagline
No inflated statistics or false claims appear in the footer
Footer layout is clean, well-spaced, and visually consistent with the rest of the site
Footer is fully responsive across all breakpoints

constraints: Do not fabricate or include any unverifiable statistics, patient counts, or satisfaction numbers
Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
Do not alter backend logic or data models — this is a frontend-only change
Preserve the existing teal/emerald/cyan color palette defined in tailwind.config.js
nonGoals: Adding new backend features or data models
Adding new portal pages or routes
Adding real patient data or testimonials
